backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with types and state for KYC records, payout methods, withdrawals, gift card rates, and related CRUD; includes authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a KYC‑gated withdrawals UI change to specific frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files covering utilities, pages, components, hooks, and configuration entries.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide describing build and deployment steps for local and production environments, including required tools and environment variables.
frontend/docs/betting-topup-video-checkl: Checklist documenting all UI steps, states, and validations for implementing the betting top‑up flow.
frontend/docs/crypto-wallet-dashboard-ch: Checklist outlining required UI sections, components, and states for the crypto wallet dashboard implementation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global CSS variables, light/dark theme tokens, and applying layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the frontend app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines routing and authentication flow, rendering login, registration, error, or main app shell based on Internet Identity and user profile states.
frontend/src/backend-augment.d.ts: Extends the backend actor TypeScript types to include access control initialization and user role assignment methods.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Guards admin-only routes by checking admin status and showing loading or access-denied UI when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/admin/CoinPriceI: Displays and updates a global coin price index with input validation, change indicators, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthInitial: Shows a full‑screen loading indicator while Internet Identity authentication initializes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Provides the login UI using Internet Identity with error handling, signup trigger, and informational dialogs.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoAct: Renders a single crypto transaction row with icon, timestamp formatting, amount, and status badge.
Loads, filters, and displays crypto transactions with tabs, skeletons, and real‑time local storage updates.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoDas: Shows a styled crypto dashboard header with total balance and a visibility toggle.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoQui: Renders a horizontal list of crypto action buttons (send, receive, buy, swap, send to bank) with icons and callbacks. Provides quick navigation triggers for various crypto operations.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoTok: Displays a list of crypto tokens with icon, name, ticker, balance, and USD value. Allows optional click handling for selecting a token.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Bu: Bottom sheet for buying crypto that lets users pick an asset, enter an amount, and logs a local pending transaction. Handles validation, loading state, and resets on close.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Re: Bottom sheet for selecting a crypto asset and showing a mock receive address with copy-to-clipboard support. Logs a placeholder received transaction when the address is copied.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Se: Bottom sheet for sending crypto, allowing users to choose an asset, input an address and amount, and create a pending local transaction. Manages form validation and processing state.
Multi-step bottom sheet for withdrawing funds to a bank account, including amount entry, payout method selection or creation, and review. Integrates payout method APIs and withdrawal submission.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Sw: Bottom sheet for swapping one crypto asset to another with mock rate calculation, reverse-swap UI, and local transaction logging. Validates inputs and manages processing state.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Displays a promotional dashboard card with text, an illustration, and dot indicators, including a gradient fallback for image errors.
Renders a clickable or disabled dashboard shortcut tile with an icon, optional badge, and size variations.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/GiftCa: Shows a selectable gift card brand row with icon fallback and brand name.
Displays label chips with an optional counter for remaining hidden tags.
Provides UI to add, remove, and save gift card labels, showing changes and save state.
Offers a popover-based filter bar for selecting and clearing gift card label filters.
Shows a card with NGN rate tiers for a gift card brand in a table format.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/NGNRat: Displays an inline summary of matched NGN rates or an unavailable notice.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/Select: Implements a bottom sheet with search for selecting a gift card brand.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryT: Renders a transaction row with icon, timestamp, amount formatting, and status badge.
frontend/src/components/kyc/DocumentSign: Canvas-based component for loading an image and capturing signature strokes, notifying parent of signature state and enabling signature export.
Main application layout providing desktop sidebar, mobile header, navigation handling, and logout controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Mobile bottom navigation bar showing key routes with icons and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/payout/NigerianB: Searchable dropdown for selecting Nigerian banks using popover and command components.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting users to enter their name and create a profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/services/BillCat: Clickable card tile showing a service category icon and label for bill-related actions.
frontend/src/config/__tests__/nigerianBa: Empty test file placeholder for Nigerian banks configuration.
frontend/src/config/betting.ts: Defines betting providers list and preset amount chip values.
frontend/src/config/finance.ts: Provides conversion config and a helper to compute gross, fee, and net values with optional overrides.
frontend/src/config/giftCardBrandCatalog: Catalog of gift card brands with icons and search terms plus a brand filtering helper.
frontend/src/config/giftCardRatesNGN.ts: Defines NGN gift card rate tiers and helpers to match amounts, format labels, and retrieve brand-specific rate tables.
frontend/src/config/nigerianBanks.ts: Provides a list of Nigerian banks and a search function that normalizes text for forgiving matching.
frontend/src/config/vendors.ts: Defines vendors with rates and fees and includes logic to compute payouts and select the best vendor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Re-exports the caller user profile query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardData.ts: Aggregates profile, KYC, cards, withdrawals, tags, and transactions into a unified dashboard data object.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRegister: Ensures an authenticated user is registered by checking and assigning roles with retry and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Checks browser notification support, tracks permission state, and provides a safe requestPermission method.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationSettin: Manages per‑principal notification preference stored in localStorage with toggle support.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileSetupSuppre: Tracks and updates per‑principal suppression of profile setup prompts using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks and mapping helpers for user profiles, KYC, payouts, withdrawal statuses, and document types between frontend and backend.
Provides hooks to fetch sell quotes for gift cards and calculate payouts by interacting with backend rate and payout APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletSummary.ts: Extracts wallet balance and currency from the current user profile for display in wallet UI components.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode theme, and utility classes including safe-area padding.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Contains utility functions for class merging, formatting currency, and formatting dates for UI usage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGiftCardRa: Provides admin UI to view, create, edit, and activate/deactivate gift card exchange rates with coin index integration.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKycReviewP: Allows admins to search users, review KYC submissions, and update verification status with document viewing.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Displays pending withdrawal requests for admins to approve or reject with status updates.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with balance display, shortcuts, and loading states using dashboard data and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/__tests__/a: Empty test file placeholder for NGN rate summary tests.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/addGiftCard: Provides helper to compute the NGN rate tier for a brand and amount using the rate table and tier matching.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/AddGiftCard: Form for users to add a gift card with brand selection, currency, amount, code, image upload, and NGN rate preview.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardDet: Displays details for a single gift card, including image, status, amount, metadata, and brand rate tables, with actions to update status.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardsLi: Lists all gift cards with filtering by tags, loading states, and navigation to add or view individual cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/HottestCard: Ranks and displays gift cards by best NGN rate using a computed ranking, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/hottestCard: Computes and sorts gift cards by best NGN rate with deterministic tiebreakers and rate extraction logic.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/SellGiftCar: Allows selling a gift card by fetching a quote, calculating payout, validating amount, and handling errors and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays local transaction history with live updates and navigation, falling back to an empty state when no entries exist.
frontend/src/pages/KycPage.tsx: Implements the KYC submission flow with document upload, optional signature capture, progress tracking, and status display.
Implements airtime purchase form with provider selection, phone input, amount chips, validation, and local transaction logging.
A two-step betting top-up form allowing users to enter provider, account ID, and amount, then review and confirm, logging the transaction locally.
frontend/src/pages/services/BillsPage.ts: Displays a grid of bill‑payment categories with navigation links for airtime, data, electricity, internet, cable TV, and betting.
frontend/src/pages/services/CableTvBills: Placeholder cable TV payment form that collects smartcard number and amount, then logs a local transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/CryptoWallet: Crypto wallet dashboard showing mock token balances, activity, and sheets for sending, receiving, buying, swapping, and cashing out crypto.
frontend/src/pages/services/DataPage.tsx: Placeholder mobile data purchase form that collects phone number and amount, then logs the transaction locally.
frontend/src/pages/services/ElectricityP: Placeholder electricity bill payment form that accepts meter number and amount, recording a local transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/WifiInternet: React page for submitting placeholder internet bill payments and logging them as local transactions.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders user settings including Internet Identity info and notification preferences with permission handling.
frontend/src/pages/withdrawals/Withdrawa: Page for managing withdrawals, including requesting withdrawals, adding payout methods, and viewing withdrawal status.
frontend/src/state/localTransactions.ts: LocalStorage-backed utility for adding, retrieving, and clearing lightweight local transaction records.
frontend/src/state/notificationSettingsS: Provides per‑principal notification setting storage using localStorage with safe read/write helpers.
frontend/src/types/app-types.ts: Type definitions for currencies, users, wallets, transactions, gift cards, KYC, payout methods, and withdrawals.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Type declarations for process.env variables used by the frontend and injected by Vite.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and enabling plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config defining plugins, aliases, env shims, build settings, dev server, and dependency optimization.
project_state.json: Defines project state for implementing KYC-gated withdrawals, including existing and pending feature requests enforcing KYC checks on UI and backend.
